what is java: Java is a widely-used programming language that was first released by Sun Microsystems in 1995 [1][2]. It is an object-oriented programming language, which means it is based on the concept of "objects," which can contain data and code to manipulate that data. Java is platform-independent, meaning it can run on any device that has a Java Virtual Machine installed, making it a popular choice for building applications that can run on a variety of devices and operating systems. It is commonly used for developing web applications, mobile applications, and enterprise software, among other things. Java is currently owned by Oracle and is one of the most popular programming languages in use today, with billions of devices running Java.

who is the father of facebook: The father of Facebook is Mark Zuckerberg. He is an American entrepreneur and computer programmer who co-founded Facebook in 2004. Zuckerberg played a crucial role in the development and growth of the social media platform, which has become one of the most influential and widely used platforms worldwide.
who is the father of computer: The concept of a “father of computer” is subjective and can be attributed to different individuals depending on the context. However, if we consider the development of the modern computer, one notable figure often referred to as the “father of the computer” is Charles Babbage. Charles Babbage was an English mathematician and inventor who conceptualized the Analytical Engine in the early 19th century. Although his design was never fully realized during his lifetime, his work laid the foundation for the development of modern computers. Babbage's Analytical Engine incorporated key elements of a general-purpose computer, including the use of punch cards for input and output, a central processing unit (CPU), and a memory system. It's important to note that the development of computers involved the contributions of numerous individuals and advancements over time. Therefore, while Babbage is often recognized as a significant figure in the history of computing, it is a collective effort that has led to the computers we use today.

what is Facebook: Facebook is a popular social media platform founded by Mark Zuckerberg in 2004. It allows users to connect with friends and family, share updates, photos, and videos, join groups and events, and follow pages of interest. Facebook has evolved over the years and now includes features like Facebook Marketplace, Facebook Watch for videos, and Facebook Gaming. It is one of the largest social media platforms in the world with billions of active users.
